titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable the Lords of the higher house of Parliament the humble petition of many thousands of the inhabitants of Norwich.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Tomlinson, and R.C. and are to be sold in the Old Bayly,

notesStmt.note: Praying "that a strong navy be provided, the votes of Popish lords removed, and meanes be used to his Majesty that he will be pleased to returne."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
